name: ASTRO ROLL
description:
Submission for the VR Jam 2021. Help our astroboi find home by arranging these small worlds to connect the path to their spaceship. 

Build for Oculus Quest (2), playable with Oculus PC. 

Controls: 

Left Joystick Forward - Teleport

Right Joystick L/R - Snap turn

Left Joystick Press - Toggle wrist AstroCam perspective

Left Joystick L/R - Pan AstroCam

Left Trigger - Start

Both Triggers Hold - Jet Pack
